Articles.Content: Hi all I'm RandomGuy1824. I started two days ago and have been addicted! I have installed the BDarmory mod and am enjoying it. I had some questions about making competetive fleets and didn't know where to post it. This is a great game and would like to say hellow to everbody!

Hello RandomGuy1824 and welcome to the KSP Forums!

Glad to hear you're enjoying the game.  I'm afraid I'm not familiar with BDarmory.  You should probably start by looking around on the BDarmory thread and go from there.

Happy landings!

Greetings @RandomGuy1824 and welcome.

I prefer to kill kerbals with my stupidity rather than weapons but I think you will find there are a few BDA competitions going on in the challenges sub-forum at any one time.
Have a nice stay Random Guy!
